title: Bug 103963: No friendly error message displayed when there is no data for series
OB: When there is no data available for a series in the chart, no error message is displayed.
EB: A friendly error message should be displayed to remind the user when there is no data available for a series in the chart.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Create a chart and set the data definition.
2. Select a column without data.
